price: 70. Tal es el favor de Al-lah; y Al-lah basta como conocedor (de quiénes merecen Su recompensa).
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
